name: Local Kitchens
desc: Developed full-stack applications as Senior Software Engineer, working on kiosks, mobile app, website, integrations, and SMS. Contributed to the rewards program and app rebrand using TypeScript, Python, Elixir, and React Native.

name: Dream Team Transfers
desc: Full-stack app simulating soccer transfers with real-life data from Transfermarkt, built using Python, React, and PouchDB.

name: Meta RL DevInfra
desc: Built and optimized web tools for Reality Labs, including Dogfooding Hub and CI systems, using React, GraphQL, Hack, Python, and MySQL to reduce runtime by 70% and improve developer efficiency across Meta's device ecosystem.

name: Prop Ellrs Tabletop
desc: Interactive web app simulating a toy robot's navigation on a 5x5 tabletop grid, built using React with intuitive controls and logic to ensure the robot stays on the grid.

name: GIPHY Search Engine
desc: Search engine for discovering trending GIFs using the GIPHY API. Built with React for real-time updates, featuring debounced search and a sleek display.

name: Oven Ready Bakes
desc: Static web page for a baking startup, built with React to showcase baked items, contact bakers, and enable order submissions with Google API integration.

name: My Github Page
desc: Interactive portfolio showcasing my work and technical experience, revamped in 2024 from a Jekyll blog to a dynamic React app for a better user experience.

name: Expense Management
desc: Full-stack app using indexedDB for reliable expense data storage and CRUD operations, with a user-friendly UI/UX built in React.

name: Twitter Search Engine
desc: Full-stack app using a Lucene index built on Twitter Crawler data for an efficient search engine, integrated into a Spring Boot and Node.js backend with an Angular front end.

name: Android Time Tracker
desc: Android app built in Kotlin for employees to log hours, using a locally hosted SQLite database and incorporating a shake-to-start feature.

name: User Engagement Map
desc: Full-stack app visualizing real-time user engagement and registration, built with React, Node.js, MongoDB, and Google Cloud APIs.

name: Krazy Kitchen Game
desc: Multiplayer Unity game with Photon networking for online play. Led a team of 5 engineers as Scrum Master, managing development and process.

name: AI and ML
desc: Implemented AI/ML projects in Python, including a dynamic chatbot, a Nearest Neighbor Classifier, and an 8-Puzzle Problem Solver.

name: Embedded Systems
desc: Developed embedded systems projects covering hardware-software integration and real-time system design using C and the ATMega microcontroller.

name: Audio Signal Processing
desc: Suite of audio processing tools created with Python scripts and interactive GUIs, inspired by my internship work.

name: BoxBot Hackathon
desc: Bluetooth-controlled RC car built using Arduino IDE, winning Best Hardware Hack at Citrus Hack 2017. Developed in a team of four engineers.
